vote.title: Authorize acquisition from The Rivera Family Limited Partnership and Marcos Rivera, containing a total of approximately 36,265 square feet of land located near the intersection of Harry Hines Boulevard and Willowbrook Road for the Joe’s Creek 42-inch Wastewater Interceptor Project - Not to exceed $46,500.00 ($40,799.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $5,701.00) - Financing: Wastewater Construction Fund
